title: Help
content: Is pessat easy compared to kcet? Is something like this similar to the avg shift?

comments.body:
I don't know why you people ask this question every 5 minutes when it's been answered a thousand times already

Please stop posting pictures of these questions, many of us are still recovering from the PTSD
Since you have ptsd, are these qns similar level?

They're generally harder than kcet but easier than mains. Most people will say one of the two. It depends on the set you get

Just prepare to answer both levels of questions

>Since you have ptsd

Bro wants answer no matter what ðŸ’€ðŸ’€
Yo genuinely can someone answer ðŸ˜­
Where did you get this? Pes doesn't release their q papers afaik
Nobody will answer the same question multiple times. Everyone's already answered that it's KCET level. Do you expect a different answer if you ask again?
KCET was tougher for me (got 6XX in kcet and 2XX in pessat so I know smth abt this)
Now which college are you in
